難読: (なんどく) - difficult to read (e.g. obscure kanji)
難関: (なんかん) - barrier; obstacle; difficulty; hurdle; deadlock
難関大: (なんかんだい) - hard-to-get-into university; elite university; highly-selective university
難関大学: (なんかんだいがく) - hard-to-get-into university; elite university; highly-selective university
難関突破: (なんかんとっぱ) - (yoji) overcoming a difficulty; breaking through a barrier; clearing a hurdle
雨あられ: (あめあられ) - hail (e.g. of bullets)/barrage/storm; rain and hail
雨があがる: (あめがあがる) - to stop raining
雨がえる: (アマガエル) - tree frog (esp. the Japanese tree frog, Hyla japonica)
雨が上がる: (あめがあがる) - to stop raining
雨が降ろうが槍が降ろうが: (あめがふろうがやりがふろうが) - come hell or high water; no matter what happens; even if rain or spears should fall
雨が降ろうと槍が降ろうと: (あめがふろうとやりがふろうと) - come hell or high water; no matter what happens; even if rain or spears should fall
雨ざらし: (あまざらし) - weatherbeaten; exposed to rain
雨のやみ間: (あめのやみま) - break in the rain; letup in the rain
雨よけ: (あまよけ) - tarpaulin; shelter from rain; covering against rain
雨久花: (ミズアオイ) - Monochoria korsakowii (species of flowering plant)
雨傘番組: (あまがさばんぐみ) - (yoji) substitute for a scheduled live broadcast of a sporting event that was rained out
雨傘蛇: (アマガサヘビ) - krait (esp. the Taiwanese banded krait, Bungarus multicinctus)
雨冠: (あまかんむり) - kanji "rain" radical at top
雨台風: (あめたいふう) - rain-laden typhoon (with relatively weak wind)
雨四光: (あめしこう) - (in hanafuda) a collection of the rain and three non-rain light cards
雨垂れ石を穿つ: (あまだれいしをうがつ) - slow but steady wins the race; constant effort will result in success; constant dripping wears away a stone
雨夜の星: (あまよのほし) - star seen on a rainy night; rare occurrence; rare sight
雨天中止: (うてんちゅうし) - cancelled because of rain; wash out
雨天延期: (うてんえんき) - postponed because of rain
雨天決行: (うてんけっこう) - rain or shine; no postponement for rain
雨天続き: (うてんつづき) - long spell of rainy weather
雨天順延: (うてんじゅんえん) - (yoji) rescheduled in case of rain
雨奇晴好: (うきせいこう) - (yoji) scenery being beautiful in both rainy and sunny weather
雨女: (あめおんな) - woman whose presence seems to cause rain
雨子: (アマゴ) - land-locked variety of red-spotted masu trout (Oncorhynchus masou ishikawae); amago
雨宝童子: (うほうどうじ) - Uho Doji (divine rain-making boy)
雨宿り: (あまやどり) - taking shelter from rain
雨後のタケノコ: (うごのタケノコ) - similar things turning up one after another; bamboo shoots after rain
雨後の筍: (うごのたけのこ) - similar things turning up one after another; bamboo shoots after rain
雨承け: (あまうけ) - gutter (on the eaves of a roof)
雨晒し: (あまざらし) - weatherbeaten; exposed to rain
雨曝し: (あまざらし) - weatherbeaten; exposed to rain
雨月: (うげつ) - being unable to see the (harvest) moon because of rain; fifth lunar month
雨模様: (あめもよう) - signs of rain; threat of rain
雨止み: (あまやみ) - break in the rain; waiting for a break in the rain
雨気: (うき) - signs of rain; threatening to rain
雨水: (うすい) - rain water; "rain water" solar term (approx. Feb 19)
雨水桝: (うすいます) - stormwater inlet; street inlet
雨波貝: (ウバガイ) - Sakhalin surf clam (Pseudocardium sachalinense)
雨混じりの雪: (あめまじりのゆき) - snow mingled with rain
雨燕: (アマツバメ) - swift (any bird of family Apodidae); fork-tailed swift (Apus pacificus)
雨男: (あめおとこ) - man whose presence seems to cause rain
雨空: (あまぞら) - rainy sky; sky as it looks when it is about to rain; threatening sky
雨竜: (あまりゅう) - rain dragon; mythical beast with yellowish green skin and red tail
雨続き: (あめつづき) - raining for days on end
